index.title: Verus - Truth and Privacy for All
index.description: Use Verus scalable public infrastructure and blockchain technology to create products, services and systems. Or start earning in the global network economy.

create.title: Create with Verus
create.description: Create products, services and systems with Verus. Start launching blockchains and tokens. Get privacy, digital identities, DeFi and more.

foundations.title: Strong Foundations for Verus
foundations.description: Verus is built to last. The multi-chain network has all the right conditions for continual growth. A scalable, decentralized and secure community network.

coin.title: VRSC Coin
coin.description: VRSC is the Verus blockchain coin. Use for payments, staking, blockchain, token and VerusID creation, and for reserves in DeFi tokens.

global.title: Verus Global Network
global.description: Verus is the center where all blockchains connect together. Creating a global network of value and liquidity.

economy.title: Earn in the Network Economy
economy.description: Participate in the network economy and earn from economic activity. Start mining and staking today. Or start earning in one of many other ways.

people.title: People Contributing to Verus
people.description: People from all over the world contribute to Verus. A true community project where anyone can contribute. And you too can be a part of it!

contribute.title: Join the Verus Community
contribute.description: The Verus community is welcome to everyone and can use your help! Donate funds or join the community channels to find out how you can contribute.

papers.title: Verus Papers
papers.description: Download one of many Verus published papers. Verus Vision Paper, Verus Proof of Power, Verus Phase I.

exchanges.title: $VRSC Exchanges
exchanges.description: All exchanges where you can trade $VRSC. Do your own due diligence on the exchanges.

wallet.title: Download Wallet
wallet.description: Download wallets to connect to the ecosystem. Verus Desktop, Verus Mobile, CLI and paper wallet. Wallets available for everyone.

desktop.title: Download Verus Desktop
desktop.description: Download Verus Desktop cryptocurrency wallet now for Windows, macOS, Linux and ARM devices. Connect to the Verus ecosystem and more.

mobile.title: Download Verus Mobile
mobile.description: Download Verus Mobile cryptocurrency wallet now for Android and iOS. Connect to the Verus ecosystem and more.

lookup.title: Search for VerusID
lookup.description: Search for VerusID. Find primary address, revocation and recovery VerusID, identity address and private address.

signatures.title: Verify Signed Files, Messages and Hashes
signatures.description: Verify files, messages and hashes for their authenticity. Make sure they are signed by the correct VerusID.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: FAQ - frequently asked questions. The most common questions answered for you.
